评论详情: Love the style and feel.
Nice dress if you like heavy material.

Bought this for an Old Hollywood party. The fabric is stretchy so the bodice fits snuggly. The design is flattering. I’m only 5’2” but the length is fine for Old Hollywood. Just slightly below my knees.
Fit as promised. Material good quality. Looks just like pics
The straps of the dress weren’t in a comfortable spot for me.

I couldn’t be happier with this dress! It was the perfect choice for a 50s/60s-themed party. The material was thick and felt high-quality, which made it both comfortable and durable. The fit was excellent—flattering in all the right places without being too tight.  I received so many compliments throughout the night, and it really helped me channel the vintage vibe I was going for. Whether you’re dressing up for a themed event or just love retro styles, this dress is a winner. Highly recommend!
Love this dress, especially the off the shoulder neckline. Elegant vintage 1940s/1950s dress in Audrey Hepburn style.
Un vestido muy elegante, muy bonito.
The shade of green is divine and immensely flattering as is the cut. The material is sturdy enough to go braless, an obvious plus with the shoulder design.
I love it
I bought the large and it was beautiful.  I received many compliments on it & a friend ordered it for a wedding.
I wore this on my wedding day at the young age of 74... I had a "hundreds" of positive comments. I LOVE this dress 👗
Perfect fit, loved the dress!
Dress better than my expectations
I loved the dress! I love how it comes to my shoulders and it sinches my waste.

I LOVE THIS DRESS! It is so well made and just beautiful. I am 5'0, 121 lbs., 34D and usually wear 6-8 petite and this dress fit perfect. It is very classic! If you're considering it, just get it...you will be delighted.
Great, heavy, thick fabric. Feels high-quality. Wrinkles easily and hard to get wrinkles out! Fit is lovely, true to size. Zipper slides easily. Very comfy.
The dress was perfect, the fit, the flair.

I was expecting this to be cheap and it was surprisingly durable. Relatively thick, but had a great shape. Was slightly difficult to iron due to the way it was packaged & the creases created, but I’m so glad I bought this. I’m in between sizes and sized up for this one, it fit great
Only a woman in her 20s or height challenged should buy this dress.

I think overall this dress was flattering, had a good weight to fabric, and was of good quality. It also arrived quickly, so ordering last minute worked out in my favor. It did wrinkle rather quickly while riding in the car on the way to the event, but a family member brought a steamer and straightened me out ahead of time. The one thing that I was NOT a fan of regarding this dress was that one of the seams tin the skirt ran straight down the front middle of the dress. The pleating wasn’t enough to distract from the seam, but I seemed to be the only one who really noticed so it wasn’t a big deal.
This dress is very flattering. Fabric and design were done well.

Got inspired by a 1940s themed movie I had seen recently and decided to buy to wear for Christmas 2023 (since then I used on my wedding anny as well). The dress is well made and not flimsy at all  2 things: -if you want the full skirt effect, buy a pettycoat, I’m wearing one in the photo. - I recommend dry cleaning bc the second time wearing I dropped some dressing on it… I washed it at home and ironed on low too but I’m sure if I had dry cleaned it would be more back to when I bought. By no means, the dress was ruined, not at all but you know what I mean when you dry cleaned… it gets more crisp.  Anyway, it’s beautiful and I’m thinking about buying in another color.

评论概述: Elegant and sexy rolled up into one perfect dress.
评论详情: I am attending an afternoon wedding at a castle in Ireland and needed something that could travel well, yet also have the right amount of sophistication. This dress fits the bill. It is made of great material and has a full skirt without needing a petticoat underneath. I am 5’3”, 123lbs and the small was perfect.

The white is actually white, not off-white. It fits as expected and is very cute. The material is somewhat elastic and wrinkles if you intentionally pinch it. The material is a little heavy so it is not a good dress for the summer. It has a more elegant feel to it compared to my expectations.

评论概述: Cannot pay that much money for a damaged dress
Size is perfect and so beautiful
评论详情: Liked a lot
Got it as a gift, the materials not that good, hoped my daughter in law will wear it, but she purchased something else.

评论概述: My girls fight over this dress - the solution to every occasion
评论详情: Dress it up or dress it down, any shape figure, this is a fabulous dress. It is not too short, though. It is above the knee on my really tall daughter. For New Year’s, one of my adult daughters, just dressed it up with a really nice jewelry and nice heels. We’ve used it as a recital dress. I really think it was originally purchased for a quinceanera. But, it was some of the best money I have ever spent. easy to wash. Just needs to be touched up with an iron or a steamer if the girls wad it up.  For your mom’s, it is sexy without being too, revealing. Your child won’t look like a slut in it. It could go for any age. Has a very classic cut to it. I have girls that are busty and I have girls that are flat, and it is flattering to all of them.
Bought this for my wife - incredible quality and fit - sexy but not trashy - really a retro look that will be perfect fir a date night
This dress was very nice and comfortable!
Bought this dress for my daughter- she really liked it! Cuter than I expected. She’s normally a 12/14 and the large fit well. Good amount of stretch which makes it comfortable!
Really cute 50’s dress for costume party. Well made. Nice stretchy fabric so it has a pleasant give.
I love this dress! Fits well. Looks so good. I bought a red petticoat for underneath.
This product is awesome! Perfectly sized for my daughter. Great fabric and fit! Sooo classy!

This dress fit me perfectly. Ordered a large - I'm 5'4, 168lbs, B cup. There's a bit of room in the chest but it sits flattering for my smaller chest. Definitely buy a petticoat for underneath though! It looks very flat without it.
